import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthenticationService } from 'src/app/service/authentication.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public basicAuth: AuthenticationService) { } user_role = sessionStorage.getItem('role'); ngOnInit() { } }
